Parameters.description: Parameters for the PUT_IN_CONTAINER operation. Puts an item from the actor's inventory into an open container. The container must be open and have sufficient capacity.

actorEntity.description: Entity ID of the actor storing the item

containerEntity.description: Entity ID of the container being stored into

itemEntity.description: Entity ID of the item being stored

result_variable.description: Optional variable name to store the operation result. Result includes {success: boolean, error?: string}
